name: ROIgrow
author: AFNI Developers
description: A program to expand an ROI on the surface.

inputs.description: Specify input surface. You can also use -t* and -spec and -surf methods to input surfaces.
inputs.name: Input Surface

inputs.description: Data column containing integer labels of ROIs. Each integer label gets grown separately.
inputs.name: ROI Labels

inputs.description: Distance to cover from each node. The units of LIM are those of the surface's node coordinates. Distances are calculated along the surface's mesh.
inputs.name: Limit Distance

inputs.description: Prefix of 1D output dataset. Default is ROIgrow
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Output a row for each node on the surface. Nodes not in the grown ROI, receive a 0 for a label. This option is ONLY for use with -roi_labels.
inputs.name: Full List Flag

inputs.description: Grow ROIs from their edges rather than the brute force default. This might make the program faster on large ROIs and large surfaces.
inputs.name: Grow From Edge Flag

inputs.description: Diameter of the sphere inside which nodes are added instead of growing along the surface.
inputs.name: Insphere Diameter

inputs.description: Use a box of edge widths E1, E2, E3 instead of DIA.
inputs.name: Inbox Edges
